body_html:
Hi @shin-migami
I was asked by Ilya and Frank (authors of the paper) to implement this learning rate decay algorithm in tensorflow. Now I found out you also work on it.

We would like to include more general version where you can also use restarts.
Did you make any progress already?
body_text:

body:
Hi @shin-migami 
I was asked by Ilya and Frank (authors of the paper) to implement this learning rate decay algorithm in tensorflow. Now I found out you also work on it. 

We would like to include more general version where you can also use restarts.
Did you make any progress already?
